title: Wan 2.2 TI2V-5B using Kelpie (DataCenter)
description: Deploy a Kelpie-powered Wan 2.2 TI2V-5B worker on DataCenter GPUs (default: L40S) to generate high-quality videos (text-to-video and image-to-video) and sync artifacts to S3-compatible storage.
